pages.text: The $(thing)plague doctor$() is one of the more… unusual professions held by the villagers. They wear markedly distinct attire from the other villagers, donning a black hat, robes, and an unusual mask that resembles a creepy bird.$(br2)They reside within huts which tend to differ from the other dwellings within villages. Monsters seem to

avoid attacking plague doctors for reasons I can’t quite discern. The rest of the village seems to shun the plague doctor; while plague doctors do indeed live under the village lord's jurisdiction, they only seem to be tolerated at best. Considering this, I’ve yet to figure out what their purpose is and why they sell the things they do, as there doesn’t seem to be any sort of sickness inflicting the residents of the village.
They like to trade unusual items, such as $(item)leeches$() and $(item)old syrup$().
